EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_OSCON TX_Q216.Post-event email 6-1-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Software - The Time for Digital Transformation is Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
With OSCON 2016 behind us, now is the time to accelerate your digital transformation. It doesn’t matter what industry you’re in—your enterprise has the opportunity to use open source software, Cloud Native platforms, and data analytics to redefine its relationship with customers, develop completely new business models, and drive new levels of profitability and efficiency.
To find out how Pivotal can help you on this journey, please join us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io]]>, August 1–4. SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating data-driven software services. Whether you are just starting your transformation journey or already delivering at scale, there will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering agile methodology, continuous delivery, devops, microservices, data analytics, machine learning, and more. Register today <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>.
We also invite you to take advantage of our library of Open Source and Digital Transformation resources, including:
- <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016]]>Webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016 <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016]]> - eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing Through Open Source Software <[[https://tdwi.org/research/2016/04/ebook-shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source.aspx?tc=page0]]> - White Paper: Agile Transformation in the Age of the Third Platform <[[http://pivotal.io/agile-transformation-in-the-age-of-the-third-platform]]> - Blog: Business Intelligence is Dead, Long Live Business Intelligence <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/p-o-v/business-intelligence-is-dead-long-live-business-intelligence]]>
Now is the time to take the reins of your Digital Transformation. Let’s build something meaningful.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
